DIY Heater: By using a thermos and a small light bulb, you can create a simple and portable heater. The thermos will retain heat, and the light bulb will generate heat when turned on.
Insulated Lunch Bag: A thermos can be used as an insulated lunch bag to keep food hot or cold for longer periods.
Water Filter: By using a coffee filter and a thermos, you can create a simple water filter to remove impurities from water.
Plant Propagation: Thermos can be used as a small propagation container for growing plants from cuttings.
Ice Pack: By filling a thermos with water and freezing it, you can create a reusable ice pack for keeping food cold or providing relief from pain and inflammation.
